result.execSummary:
The defendant Stephanie M Lewis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Attempt Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

No Restitution being claimed.
Court will allow probation may be served in Forest County, if probation accepts.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Stephanie M Lewis
Current: 4895 Elm St, PO Box 1, Laona, WI 54566 United States  (Effective: 12-29-2014)
Prior: 802 N. Hogan, Antigo, WI 54409

Defendant Stephanie M Lewis in court with attorney David Gardner Casey.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls @ 9:50 am.  Plea advisement filed.  State no contact from victim, no responds, Amend to 943.20(1)(a),  Attempt Theft as a repeater, Misdemeanor 939.32, Attempt, withheld sentence 1 yrs probation, no restitution, costs. Atty Casey agrees with plea agreement.  Def. agrees to plea agreement and understands amended charges & penalties.  Court approves amended charge, Ct 1 Attempt Theft, repeater, no contest plea.  Def. advised of constitutional rights & J.T. rights. Court direct to enter no contest plea.  State has factual basis. Atty Casey factual basis & is satisfied.  Court accepts plea & enter into record.  State & Atty Casey request court to enter plea agreement.  Def makes statement.  
Court accepts plea agreement & orders withheld sentence 1 year probation, costs.  No Restitution being claimed. If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Def. advised of postconviction rights. Atty Casey probation being served in Forest Co.  Court will allow if probation accepts. DNA surcharge is included in costs.

Defendant Stephanie M Lewis in court with attorney David Gardner Casey.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint received, reviewed, waive reading.  Time limits for preliminary waived.  Bond will continue  Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2014 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Stephanie M Lewis in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Def has copy of complaint.  Court reads charge with possible penalties.  Def advised of right to an atty.  State request signature bond.  Bond set by Court  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 3, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
